#summary Information for new users of Daisy.
#labels Subject-Daisy,Structure

Note: These instructions assume you use MS Windows, there is another page for [Unix Linux, MacOS X and other Unix users].

Fetch the latest Daisy version from the *Featured Downloads* box at the rigth side of the [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-model/ front page], and then follow the [TextPad instructions for configuring TextPad]. 

  * Examine what the installer installs. Explore the directory structure.
  * Read the [Tutorial tutorial].
  * Get familiar with the [ReferenceManual reference manual].
  * Do the [Exercises exercises].
  * Read about [Science the science behind Daisy].
